rationale: No intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifies a risk-adjective.
No high-potency verb, metaphor, superlative, or critical alert phrase.
The segment discusses duration ('can take') without a moderate verb paired with scale/impact.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
This reports manufacturing time, not explicit calming language.
The segment does not contain a minimiser used in conjunction with a scale contrast.
The segment describes the time manufacturing can take but contains no bare negation.
Describes a capability/process parameter ('Manufacturing... can take four to six months') without active reassurance.
